entry.title: Where We Belong by E. Alexander
entry.summary:
Author: Phoenix_parklife

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,087Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: The ‚ÄòWhere We Belong‚Äô saga is a trilogy of novels centered around a group of survivors, each blessed with unique abilities. As the third book comes out, Christopher, Denny and Harry all get caught up in reading the entire trilogy, Chris in particular loving the fact he can relate to one of the characters, Clark Dieguez who also has CP.As the firefam learn of the books, Hen is quick to realize that they each closely resemble characters in the story, leading the firefam to uncover the identity of the mysterious author, E. Alexander.

entry.title: Dream date (with the right person)
entry.summary:
Author: Elgcarres

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,886Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: ‚ÄòHere, your coffee. So, did you manage to plan your dream date?‚ÄôEddie takes a mug from Buck's hands and grins‚ÄòMore or less. You helped a lot. I mean‚Ä¶ It was a challenge to book a table and stuff but in the end it should be worth it. You?‚Äô‚ÄòI'm babysitting. So Chim has his dream date - thanks for letting me know by the way.‚ÄôThe mug in Eddie's hands shakes just a bit‚ÄòThat‚Äôs your plan?‚Äô‚ÄòYou know..‚ÄôBuck takes a sip from his own cup to stop himself from saying something stupid. Something like ‚ÄòYou should come. You should stand your date up and come. I'll bake your favourite scones.‚ÄôHe takes another sip.Finally Eddie scoffs‚ÄòI know what? Cause apparently I don't‚Äô‚ÄòI decided to step out from dating for some time. I told you, it's ‚Äòwho‚Äô. I'm waiting for‚Ä¶ the right person.‚ÄôWho, apparently, is a straight renter. Fuck.*** Eddie tries to have a dream date. Buck tries to bake a thousand cookies.It wouldn't be so crazy, Maddie said.

entry.title: What a night to forget.
entry.summary:
Author: Absolute_Maniac

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,212Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 126

Summary: ‚ÄúHey, can you see my phone anywhere?‚Äù he asked. Eddie started looking around the bed and then stretched himself to his side of the bed and pulled it from the nightstand.‚ÄúHere.‚Äù He tossed it to him, and Buck immediately started looking through recent pictures on his phone. Pictures of them partying, a video of Eddie taking a shot, and another video of Eddie dancing.Then he came across the next picture and felt as if someone had thrown a bucket of ice water over his head. They must have asked someone else to take the picture because it was taken from at least a two-meter distance. The two of them were holding out a piece of paper towards the camera‚Ä¶ and they were pressed together in a passionate kiss.Buck looked up from the picture when Eddie made a strangled sound on the other side of the room. ‚ÄúYou might want to see this‚Ä¶‚Äù He reached over with a piece of paper in his hand. Buck took it and turned his phone over to him in return. Eddie bit into his fist as he studied the picture. Buck looked down at the paper in his hand and turned it over to the right side. It was a copy of a marriage license for Mr. Evan Buckley-Diaz and Mr. Edmundo Buckley-Diaz.

entry.title: The Trials and Tribulations of Evan Buckley and Eddie Diaz: A Tragedy in 97 Acts (Give or Take a Few)
entry.summary:
Author: A_rnie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,330Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: If you're looking for a smooth, predictable love story, you've come to the wrong place. This is Buck and Eddie. Their relationship is less a gentle stream and more a raging river crashing down a cliff face, occasionally pausing in picturesque pools of affection before plunging into another waterfall of near-death experiences, miscommunications, and existential dread. So, buckle up, buttercup. You‚Äôre in for a ride.

entry.title: afterimage
entry.summary:
Author: madforyou

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,032Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 34

Summary: He's going back to the aquarium. Not for Buck. Obviously, categorically, definitively not for Buck. For Christopher, who loved it. For a new sticker, because the old one is gone and he needs a replacement the way you'd replace a toothbrush or a phone charger, because it's a functional object that serves a functional purpose in his life. If Buck happens to be there, then fine, great. Eddie can say hi, because there's nothing weird about wanting to see someone again. People revisit people. That's a normal thing to do. It doesn't have to mean anything. Besides, Chris loved Buck, so really, he only hopes Buck is there so Chris can see him again. Or,Eddie and his totally normal obsession with the aquarium. Which definitely has nothing to do with a certain employee named Buck. Part 2 to 'i'll take sexuality crisis at the aquarium for $108, Alex'

entry.title: Leave This Fucked Up Place Behind (But I'll Know)
entry.summary:
Author: Loves_BuckleyDiaz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,407Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 4

Summary: Buck and Eddie were childhood neighbors, best friends, and almost lovers. Now, being next door neighbors meant Eddie heard everything next door. From the screaming matches, the glass breaking, and sometimes the sound of a hand connecting to a cheek. Buck on the other end, was victim to all of the vile sounds Eddie had heard over the fence. Buck wasn't exempt to hearing sounds over the fence. Screaming matches as well, the occasional door slam, never any hitting though.Buck and Eddie had known each other since 5th grade‚ÄîBuck moved after a messy CPS case that had his parents angry and nervous‚Äî they'd been inseparable ever since Eddie had asked Buck if he was okay and "Where did that bruise on your eyebrow come from?‚ÄùThey'd grown up together. Phases of their lives passed by, awkward middle school photos to high school graduation. But they'd always kept their same promise.We‚Äôre gonna leave this place, together.

entry.title: Better The Devil You Know, Than The Devil You Don't...
entry.summary:
Author: InterrogateTheCat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,556Chapters: 13/50Kudos: 454

Summary: Lucifer made a deal with the Buckley's, he will save Daniel and they take in and love his son Evan as their own. When the Buckley parents don't follow through with their side of the deal, Lucifer brings Evan with him to LA. This is the story of Evan Buckley the Son of the Devil, The Prince of Hell. Note:First 2 Chapters go through his life before the 118.Chapter 3 he is with the 118.Chapter 4 is when Eddie arrives. [You don't really need to watch Lucifer, but it would be helpful, but enough context will be supplied.] This is mostly in 911 universe, with comments and references from the Lucifer universe. ü´£ü§≠ üòà üî™ üöí üöî

entry.title: Catch Me When I Fall
entry.summary:
Author: Ollie_22

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,455Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 174

Summary: ‚ÄòYou‚Äôre in the hospital.‚Äô His sister‚Äìwhat was her name?--supplied. ‚ÄòThere was an accident at work.‚ÄôWork? Where did he work again? In the clouds? Maybe he fell from one of them.‚ÄòDid you want me to get Eddie?‚ÄôA warm feeling bloomed in his chest. Eddie‚Ä¶yes that word was familiar. He nodded, slowly.His sister smiled softly and squeezed his hand. His eyelids drooped, heavy.‚ÄòYou rest.‚Äô Her voice was soft. ‚ÄòEddie will be here when you wake.‚Äô¬†ORBuck has been managing his recent bipolar diagnosis well. He and Eddie are finally together, he's back at work and everything is looking up. That is until, lightning strikes, Buck goes off his meds and well, things spiral from there. (Sequel to 'I didn't Know')
